'''Sneku''' is a [[Northland Cat]] and [[NPC]] located in [[The Cat's Tail]], [[Mondstadt]].

It is one of the challengers that can be faced in a [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage#Tavern Challenges|Tavern Challenge]].
